tools.name: Smart Soil Moisture Probe
tools.short_description: A handheld probe that measures soil moisture levels at various depths and provides instant recommendations for irrigation timing and water volume based on crop type and growth stage.
tools.pain_point: Farmers struggle to know optimal irrigation timing
tools.opportunity: Proper moisture management can increase yields by 20%

tools.name: SoilSense Pro
tools.short_description: A handheld device that instantly analyzes soil composition, pH levels, moisture content, and nutrient deficiencies by inserting a probe into the ground.
tools.pain_point: Farmers often don't know the exact nutrient levels in their soil
tools.opportunity: Precise soil analysis can optimize fertilizer use, saving costs and improving yields
tools.target_users: Small to medium-scale farmers, organic growers, and agricultural consultants
key_features: Moisture depth analysis up to 12 inches
tools.technical_approach: Simulated sensor readings with crop-specific optimization
